feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with drizzle ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
